name: Histogram Gradient Analysis
description: Analyzes histogram smoothness and gaps to detect AI-generated images which often have atypical intensity distributions.
mechanism: Computes the discrete derivative of the intensity histogram and analyzes its smoothness and gap patterns. AI-generated images often produce unnaturally smooth histograms or exhibit specific gap patterns.
parameters: Bins: 256, Derivative: first-order, Smoothness: variance of derivative, Gap detection: zero-run analysis
source: Farid, H. (2016) — Photo Forensics, MIT Press
useCase: Detecting unnatural intensity distribution patterns in AI content

references.title: Farid, H. (2016). Photo Forensics. MIT Press.
